name: HUNTR/X
description: HUNTR/X is inspired by Netflix's K-Pop Demon Hunters anime, featuring fierce characters who fight supernatural threats with K-Pop power.

funFacts: Has the power to channel lightning through her voice
Was recruited after defeating a demon alone
Her high notes can shatter demon barriers
Natural born leader with strategic mind
Protects her team with fierce loyalty
members.bio: Rumi is HUNTR/X's fearless leader whose powerful vocals can channel supernatural energy. She leads the team against demon threats with strategic brilliance and unwavering courage.

funFacts: Her rap flows can create fire barriers
Fastest demon hunter in the squad
Trained in martial arts since childhood
Her dance moves double as combat techniques
Never backs down from a challenge
members.bio: Mira is HUNTR/X's fierce rapper and dancer whose movements are deadly both on stage and in battle. Her fire-infused rap creates protective barriers for her team.

funFacts: Can see demons that others cannot
The visual who stuns both humans and demons
Her gentle nature hides immense power
Brings hope to the darkest situations
members.bio: Zoey is HUNTR/X's visual whose ethereal beauty masks incredible healing powers. Her voice can mend wounds and bring light to darkness, making her essential to the team.

seo.title: K-Pop Demon Hunters Name Generator | HUNTR/X Netflix Inspired
seo.description: Create your K-Pop Demon Hunters name with HUNTR/X! Inspired by Netflix anime, generate futuristic Korean names with Rumi, Mira & Zoey.
